thread.title: Utes video: A look at Utah basketball's new practice facility
thread.title_full: Utes video: A look at Utah basketball's new practice facility | Deseret News

author: Carter Williams
title: Utes video: A look at Utah basketball's new practice facility
text:
University of Utah athletics cut the ribbon on its brand new Jon M. and Karen Huntsman Basketball Facility on Thursday and the Deseret News was given a look around the brand new 100,000-square foot building.
More Coverage New Utah basketball facility has high 'wow' factor University of Utah athletics cut the ribbon on its brand new Jon M. and Karen Huntsman Basketball Facility on Thursday and the Deseret News was given a look around the brand new 100,000-square foot building.
The $36 million complex has five floors, including two 12,000 square foot practice gyms, state of the art equipment, lounges and basketball offices for both the men's and women's basketball teams.
Men’s head coach Larry Krystkowiak, whose office is on the fourth floor, and women’s head coach Lynne Roberts each have an office that overlooks the campus and the Salt Lake valley. Both are 935 square feet and are designed in similar fashion and each include a fireplace, a 60-inch television screen and a private bathroom with shower.
Click the video above for a tour of the new facility.
